thread.title: Ghana Premier League Awards set for October 30
thread.title_full: Ghana Premier League Awards set for October 30

title: Ghana Premier League Awards set for October 30
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 21:10 CET Ghana Premier League Awards set for October 30 - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana League 
The Ghana Football Association and the Premier League Board have announced the 2014/15 First Capital Plus Premier League Awards will be held on Friday, 30 October. 
The event will take place at the La Palm Royal Beach Hotel in Accra. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
